message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $16,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $8,000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,500?
